Assign ResponsibleParty IDs and append recurrences to the rp data frame

Source: R/annotate_eml.R
append_rp.Rd

This is a helper function for annotate_eml()

append_rp(responsible.party, annotations.template)

Arguments

responsible.party

(emld list) A ResponsibleParty EML node in the emld list format.

annotations.template

(data.frame) The annotations template created within annotate_eml().

Value

responsible.party

(emld list) Annotated responsible party node

rp

(data.frame) the rp object
